Import FiveThirtyEight data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

pols_month_df = 
  read_csv(file = 
      "./fivethirtyeight_datasets/pols-month.csv")

```

Review column names in pols month df, and separate date variable into month, year, and day. 

```{r}
names(pols_month_df)

separate(pols_month_df, col = mon, into = c("Year",
    "Month", "Day"), sep = "-")

replace(pols_month_df, "Month", "")
```

Column names are already in a usable format, so not using janitor::clean_names function.
